content:
Insurance Release Notes 
Learn About the Digital Insurance Platform 
See Insurance in Action with the Insurance Application Suite 

Work With Claims Financials 

Claims adjusters can get a quick overview of claims and related tasks, and then dive into the management of individual claims.

Open Coverages on a Claim 
Add Claim Loss Payments 
Take Action on Loss Payments 
Add Claim Expense Payments 
Take Action on Expense Payments 

Manage a Claim's Participants 
Manage a Claim's Involved Items 
Approve or Reject Payment Authorization Requests
title: Managing Insurance Claims in Salesforce
